snippet: His tenure marred by economic crisis and an earthquake, Mr. de la Madrid is credited for setting Mexico on a path to a free-market economy and, inadvertently, multiparty rule.
abstract: Miguel de la Madrid, former president of Mexico, dies at age 77.

byline.contributor: Elisabeth Malkin contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: His tenure marred by economic crisis and an earthquake, Mr. de la Madrid is credited for setting Mexico on a path to a free-market economy and, inadvertently, multiparty rule.

headline.seo: Miguel de la Madrid, President of Mexico in 1980s, Dies at 77
headline.main: Miguel de la Madrid, President of Mexico in 1980s, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Miguel de la Madrid, 77, Dies; Led Mexico in the 1980s
